description.gold-silver:
Fires three kinds
of beams at once.
description.crystal:
Fires three kinds
of beams at once.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Fires three types of beams
at the same time.
description.emerald:
Fires three types of beams
at the same time.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A simultaneous
3-beam attack that
may paralyze, burn,
or freeze the foe.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user strikes with
a simultaneous three-
beam attack. May also
paralyze, burn, or
freeze the target.
description.platinum:
The user strikes with
a simultaneous three-
beam attack. May also
paralyze, burn, or
freeze the target.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user strikes with
a simultaneous three-
beam attack. May also
paralyze, burn, or
freeze the target.
description.black-white:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze,
or leave the target with paralysis.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze,
or leave the target with paralysis.
description.x-y:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze,
or leave the target with paralysis.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze,
or leave the target with paralysis.
description.sun-moon:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam
attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam
attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack.
This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
description.sword-shield:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack.
This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
